headline: PLDT (PSE:TEL) Declares P2,437,500 Dividend And Elects New Board Members
summary: PLDT (PSE:TEL) recently announced key executive and board changes, including the election of Mr. Menardo G. Jimenez, Jr. as a director and appointing Fr. Roberto C. Yap, S.J. as an independent advisor, coinciding with the company declaring a PHP 2,437,500 cash dividend on Voting Preferred Stock. Despite these announcements, PLDT's share price experienced a 1% decline last week. This movement contrasts with the broader market, which showed an increase, suggesting that internal changes and...
